meanings.definition: Not protected against a disease by vaccination.
meanings.sent1: The unimmunized child was at risk of getting sick.
meanings.sent2: The unimmunized population was vulnerable to outbreaks.
meanings.sent3: The unimmunized teddy bear was worried about catching a cold.
meanings.sent4: The unimmunized city was a ticking time bomb for infections.
meanings.sent5: The unimmunized students were like sitting ducks for illnesses.

meanings.sent1: The unimmunized puppy needed to visit the vet.
meanings.sent2: The unimmunized travelers had to be careful in foreign countries.
meanings.sent3: The unimmunized plant was jealous of its vaccinated neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The unimmunized computer was prone to viruses.
meanings.sent5: The unimmunized kittens were kept indoors to avoid diseases.
